title: Here is the first headline.
uaqs_summary_short: Iamque super triginta milia armatorum aspiciebantur

title: Here is the second headline.
uaqs_summary_short: et adhuc adfluebat omnis iuventus et quibus cruda ac viridis senectus, clari bello et sua quisque decora gestantes

title: Here is the third headline.
uaqs_summary_short: cum inter pluris duces virtute et genere praestans nomine Calgacus

title: Here is the fourth headline.
uaqs_summary_short: apud contractam multitudinem proelium poscentem in hunc modum locutus fertur
